summary: Prepared platform-lane follow-up tasks for web packaging, Steam wrapper packaging, and Android wrapper packaging, all constrained to first-slice scope with placeholder assets only.

proposed_work_items.title: Create reproducible web vertical-slice packaging and run scripts
proposed_work_items.description: Define and implement a deterministic web packaging path for the first vertical slice, including a single-command build/package flow, local run smoke command, and placeholder-only release metadata/artifact manifest.
acceptance_criteria: A repo-documented command sequence can produce a repeatable web-first vertical-slice artifact from `client-web`
Packaging flow includes placeholder-only release metadata/asset references and does not depend on final art
A local run/smoke command is documented and executes against the packaged artifact

proposed_work_items.title: Scaffold Steam wrapper packaging lane using Tauri default
proposed_work_items.description: Set up an initial Steam-targeted desktop wrapper path around the web client using the documented Tauri-first strategy, with reproducible build/run commands and deferred Steamworks/native integrations.
acceptance_criteria: A Tauri-based wrapper scaffold is added for Windows-first packaging of the web vertical-slice artifact
Wrapper docs/scripts define repeatable local run and packaged build commands without requiring Steamworks feature integration
Store/build placeholders (icon/capsule/metadata) are explicitly marked temporary and final art is not a blocker

proposed_work_items.title: Scaffold Android wrapper packaging lane using Capacitor default
proposed_work_items.description: Set up an initial Android packaging path around the web client via Capacitor/WebView with deterministic sync/build/run steps, touch-safe baseline configuration, and placeholder-only mobile store assets.
acceptance_criteria: A Capacitor/WebView wrapper scaffold is added with repeatable commands to sync web assets and produce an Android debug/release package
Wrapper configuration covers first-slice essentials (back button/orientation/safe-area baseline) without adding new game mechanics
Android icon/splash/store metadata are placeholder-only and explicitly non-blocking for final art

summary: Implemented deterministic web vertical-slice packaging and local packaged-artifact smoke flow with placeholder-only release metadata and documented command sequence.

proposed_work_items.title: Gate platform lane with packaged web artifact smoke validation
proposed_work_items.description: Add daemon validation hooks for platform-owned web packaging items so deterministic package build and packaged-artifact smoke commands run automatically before completion.
acceptance_criteria: Platform validation can run `python tools/web_vertical_slice_packaging.py package --clean` automatically for matching work items
Platform validation can run `python tools/web_vertical_slice_packaging.py smoke` against the produced artifact
Blocked/success outcomes are surfaced in daemon command-result summaries
